ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely man is greedy by nature.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily man is impatient by nature:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed man is created very impatient, greedy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, man was created very impatient;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely man is created of a hasty temperament
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed man has been created covetous:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly man was created very impatient;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, man (disbeliever) was created very impatient;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, the human was created grudging and impatient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:19] Indeed man was created restless: (halū‘an is an implied circumstantial qualifier, the explanation of which [follows]):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Man) i.e. the disbelieving person (was created anxious) miserly, too attached and tight-fisted,
